parameters.name: Category
parameters.description: The ID of the blacklist policy.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of the instances in the blacklist policy.

Valid values of N: 0 to 10.

parameters.name: IsEnable
parameters.description:
The status of the blacklist policy. Valid values:

*   true: The blacklist policy is enabled.
*   false: The blacklist policy is disabled.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the blacklist policy.

This parameter supports fuzzy match.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The timestamp when the blacklist policy expired.

Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The HTTP status code.

>  The status code 200 indicates that the call was successful.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The categories of the Alibaba Cloud service. For example, ApsaraDB for Redis includes the following categories: ApsaraDB for Redis (standard architecture), ApsaraDB for Redis (cluster architecture), and ApsaraDB for Redis (read/write splitting architecture). In this case, the valid values of this parameter for ApsaraDB for Redis include `kvstore_standard`, `kvstore_sharding`, and `kvstore_splitrw`.

parameters.name: ScopeType
parameters.description:
The effective scope of the blacklist policy. Valid values:

*   USER: The blacklist policy takes effect only within the current Alibaba Cloud account.
*   GROUP: The blacklist policy takes effect only within the specified application group.
